name: Heart Menders
description:
Heart Menders is a co-op game where 2 friends help people in a colorful world. The players must find the missing pieces of people and bring them back to make them happy again.

Controls
For a better gameplay experience,  use controllers (Xbox 360 or Xbox One). However, there is keyboard input available for 2 players.

Controller
Move- Left analog stick
Sprint- L2 (Left Trigger)
Jump- A
Drop- B
Pick Up- Y 
Throw- X

Keyboard
Player 1
  Move: WASD
  Sprint: Left Shift
  Throw: F
  Pick Up: E
  Drop: X
  Jump: Space
Player 2
  Move- Arrow Keys
  Sprint- Right Shift
  Throw- Keypad +
  Pick Up- Keypad Enter
  Drop- Keypad Period
  Jump- Keypad 0

Credits

Game design, level design, puzzle design, audio, music, UI -Elaine Gómez
Programming (scripts and shaders) - Ben Sanchez
